verbose_text: The enzymatic activity of heat inactivated CS in the absence (*) or in the presence of apoferitin in molecular ratios 1:1 (red *) and 1:5 (green ^), respectively, and in presence of alpha-crystallin (blue v) and Tg (light blue []), both at a 1:5 molecular ratio of CS to chaperone like protein is shown on Panel D. Apoferritin protects an enzymatic activities of citrate synthase and aldolase.
